dublinCore.dc:title: 114 S520 IS: To amend the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to reauthorize the Act.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cardin introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act to reauthorize the Act.

section.header: Reauthorization of Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act
section.text: Section 10 of the Neotropical Migratory Bird Conservation Act (16 U.S.C. 6109) is amended to read as follows:

subsection.text: There is authorized to be appropriated to carry out this Act $6,500,000 for each of fiscal years 2015 through 2020.
Of the amounts made available under subsection (a) for each fiscal year, not less than 75 percent shall be expended for projects carried out at a location outside of the United States.
